name: Schedule defrost
description: Start defrost action - ideally set this as a personal automation at your desired schedule

name: Start climate
description: Activate climate - use this action to start the climate with Siri

name: Start Charging
description: If plugged in, tell the vehicle to start charging now

name: Stop Charging
description: If vehicle is charging, tell it to stop

name: Open Frunk
description: Tell vehicle to open the front trunk

name: Open Trunk
description: Tell vehicle to open the trunk

name: Close Trunk
description: For vehicles with power trunk, close the trunk
